ygData.subject: Re: Apocalypse returns to the Sulaco
ygData.msgSnippet: Apocalypse looked at the map. The ones known as the Mafia are pretty weak my master. Also the ones known as the decepticons should be a force that we should

From: Robert Thomas <Kinger1984@...>

 Apocalypse looked at the map. "The ones known as the
Mafia are pretty weak my master. Also the ones known
as the decepticons should be a force that we should
destroy while it is still in its infant stages. There
is also the scattered predacons across the region. But
the weakest foe so far would be either the maximals or
the Mafia."  
--- t882hcc91@... wrote:
> (Cerberus isn't near the base, as Dachande isn't)
> 
> Magmatron:
> 
>      "Welcome back friends," Magmatron said from his
> darkened command 
> chair. They could only see his green eyes.
> "Computer, lights."
>      The lights came on and Magmatron rose in his
> new impressive 
> robot mode. "This war will be quick and deadly, we
> will take no 
> prisioners, I want to get back to my galaxy as soon
> as I can. It was 
> so much more fun there, clowns and things like
> that."
>      Magmatron punched a few keys and brought up a
> map of every base 
> on the planet, as of when he had left. Then a red
> line passed over 
> the screen and the map updated. "Which one is
> weakest?"
> 
>
